column5: More than likely referring to an "Ontario" outdoors card.https://www.ontario.ca/page/get-outdoors-card
Curious as my 3 year Canada Outdoor Card expired last year if they are “grandfathering” another year or if I need to order one for my September trip?
I can't imagine them not requiring a new one.
Rich I don't anything is grandfatherd in,they want every dollar you have

FYI Last year was the middle year of my Outdoor Card and license. When I heard that refunds were being given I called. I was told that since I could have ice fished before the border closed I would not get a refund. The refunds were for a license not an Outdoor Card.
Get a new card they cost less than $10
You are right and I will just get oneDifferent subject, but did you see the Biden Administration is keeping the border closed until Aug 21 ….oddhttps://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/can...AG4Xy0oDyfh8ww
night crawlers around me self identify as long stringy things So, I guess I'm OK to invite them along with me on a trip to Ontario.
Evidently, you haven't read the post about "Bait". Crawlers will no longer be allowed into Canada. The only purpose for your long slimy things is to make your yard difficult to mow.
Curios, I am a Canadian Outdoorsman fishing, hunting, etc for decades (western Canada, and the Arctic). What is a Canada Outdoor card? Thank you PB43
